geekshop.controller

Class ReclaimController

  • java.lang.Object
    • geekshop.controller.ReclaimController

  • @Controller
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
 @SessionAttributes(value="cart")
class ReclaimController
extends java.lang.Object
    A Spring MVC controller to manage the Cart.

      • determineNotReclaimedAmountOfProduct

        private java.math.BigDecimal determineNotReclaimedAmountOfProduct(GSOrder orderToBeReclaimed,
                                                                  GSProduct product)
        As the method name says, determines the not reclaimed amount of GSProduct bought in the given order.
        Parameters:
        orderToBeReclaimed - the sale which contains the given product
        product - the product whose not reclaimed amount is to be determined
